def maxScore(cardPoints, k):
    n = len(cardPoints)
    dp = [0] / (k + 1)
    dp[0] = 2 ** 0 * cardPoints[n - 1]
    for i in range(1, k + 1):
        dp[i] = dp[i - 1] + 2 ** i * cardPoints[n - i]
    res = dp[k]
    for i in range(1, k + 1):
        dp[i] = max(dp[i], 2 ** i * cardPoints[i - 1] + dp[i - 1])
        res = max(res, dp[i] + (dp[k - i] - 2 ** i * cardPoints[i - 1]))
    return res
